messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: 2yo food
messages.messageBody:
<<From: dacunefare@...

I have the most marvelous picture of my then 2 yo daughter sitting in the
middle of the kitchen table with a huge grin on her face, surrounded by
apples that each have one little nibble taken out of them.
She's 17 now. She hasn't done anything like that in a long time. :)>>


That is too funny. My oldest, who will be 17 shortly also did that with
apples. Nothing else but apples. Except she would go into the fridge when I
wasn't looking, take a bite out of one apple and put it back, take a bite
out of another apple and put it back. She did that until she bit them all. I
have a picture too of her standing at the fridge, wearing only a diaper with
a one bite apple in her hand!!!
She still thinks that story is hysterical!


Mary B

messages.subject: RE: 2yo food
messages.msgSnippet: **I m sure we ll all get through it. It is funny most of the time. Looks like we have a mouse in the house as we find food with one little bite out of it!! **
messages.messageBody:
**I'm sure we'll all get through it. It is funny most of the time. Looks like
we have a mouse in the house as we find food with one little bite out of
it!! **

I have the most marvelous picture of my then 2 yo daughter sitting in the
middle of the kitchen table with a huge grin on her face, surrounded by
apples that each have one little nibble taken out of them.

She's 17 now. She hasn't done anything like that in a long time. :)

Deborah in IL
